channel.title: nowhere in mulberry
channel.description: A show about pop culture and the movies and entertainment that come with it.
channel.copyright: Nowhere In Mulberry is the soul property of The Jastrom and his co-hosts.

item.title: Nowhere in Mulberry Ep 17
item.description:
Year End Holiday Mash-up!
Listen to our favorite clips of the show while we lock and load and raid Mulberry Bill's Zombie Infested Home! Taking Back the Historical Library!
Jam Packed Show of our Favorite moments. Ring in the new year Mulberry Style!
Happy New Year!

item.title: Nowhere in Mulberry Ep 3
item.description: The Jastrom and Stephen are back along with Mulberry Bill and Vanessa. On this show we discuss: Our new Website-ODEO-Podcast Pickle-Jastrom's family vacation-We watch the trailer to the new movie 'Into The Blue' and listen to clips of the new Jennifer Love Hewitt show 'The Ghost Whisperer'-In Bill's DVD segment we discuss Battlestar Galactica Season 1 Boxed set-Mallrats 10th Anniv DVD-"What's on you TIVO?" W/Lost talk and Threshold and Survivor talk-The "Movie Drops" Game-The News with Vanessa
item.itunes:author: Jason Walstrom

item.title: Nowhere In Mulberry Ep 2
item.description: The Jastrom and Stephen are back this time joined by Mulberry Historian Bill and the always newsworth Vanessa as they discuss current events like FEMA and the movie 'Brokeback Mountain' along with tv shows Rockstar INXS and Battlestar Galactica. The News and EVP and Ghost Hunting.

The News and EVP and Ghost Hunting.

item.title: Nowhere In Mulberry Ep 1
item.description: Smack dab in the cultural district of Mulberry Square Stephen and I, The Jastrom discuss The aftermath of Hurricane Katrina. The new movie 'Waiting...' And Vaness joins us for the News.
item.itunes:author: Jason Walstrom
